# FFmpeg License Information

This Ollama distribution includes minimal LGPL 2.1+ components from FFmpeg for video decoding functionality. **NO GPL-licensed components are included.**
FFmpeg can be built under different licenses depending on which components are enabled. This build uses **LGPL 2.1+ only**.
**License text:** https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html
